attributes.action: Let cancer patients having their treatments and surgeries even in this emergency
attributes.additional_details:
NHS and GOVERNMENT must let cancer patients continue having their treatments.
It's not acceptable being treated as less worth lives or as numbers.
Fighting with cancer is terribly challenging, people with other conditions should be given extra care instead of being abandoned. 
I beg politics, government, nhs and whoever has the power to change this surreal situation that many of us are living.
I am one of the thousands trapped in this joke , living with an incurable disease.
I want to get access to my treatments again!
attributes.background:
Cancer patience must have the right to keep having their treatments and the care they need in order to mantain a good life quality.
NHS MUST continue treatments to all cancer patients including trials.

rejection.details:
Decisions about the provision of medical treatment during the current outbreak is a matter for NHS England and individual NHS trusts, and not the Government or Parliament.

The NHS has provided the following advice to Trusts on maintaining cancer treatment during the COVID-19 response: https://www.england.nhs.uk/coronavirus/publication/advice-to-trusts-on-maintaining-cancer-treatment-during-the-covid-19-response/

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
 
Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
